select ai.c_id as ai_id, ai.c_state as ai_state, ai.c_update_time as ai_update_time, u.c_id as u_id, u.c_name as u_name, an.c_id as an_id, an.c_name as an_name, an_u.c_id as an_u_id, an_u.c_name as an_u_name from approval_info_tbl as ai left join user_tbl as u on ai.c_approval_user_id=u.c_id left join approval_node_tbl as an on ai.c_node_id = an.c_id left join approval_node_user_relation_tbl as an_u_rel on an.c_id=an_u_rel.c_node_id left join user_tbl as an_u on an_u_rel.c_user_id=an_u.c_id
and an.c_id = #{id}
